data.eml:eml: The spider genus Austrochilus Gertsch & Zapfe, 1955 (Araneae: Austrochilidae) - a new species from Chile and a documentation of the male genitalia of austrochilines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wunderlich, Joerg (2017): The spider genus Austrochilus Gertsch & Zapfe, 1955 (Araneae: Austrochilidae) - a new species from Chile and a documentation of the male genitalia of austrochilines. Zootaxa 4312 (2): 323-332, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4312.2.7
